title: Which are the best snack centers in Amravati? - Quora

response.answer_text: some good snack centres in Amravati (restaurants + street stalls) - For Naashta ( samosa kachori sambharwadi) - Mamaji’s at jaistambh square Raghuvir at shyam chowk and rajapeth Roshni Hotel and upahar gruh at Panchavati square ( all day from morning ) sahu bhaiya at Ujambawadi,Ambapeth near Income tax office(afternoon till evening 6 pm) Manish ki kachori in jawahar gate (morning only) Nanakramji sharma in jawahar Gate (all naashta + very good kaanjiwada Morning only) Brahmani chat in Jawahar Gate ( all day from morning ) Moong bhaje stall at Bank of Maharashtra Gate infront of Hotel Ramgiri ,Amravati Railway station road ( EVENING ONLY ) Gadwal infront of biyani College,Ravi Nagar shegaon Kachori near Ambadevi temple For Paav Bhaji - shiv paav bhaji and Pulav kathora naka,Amravati (evening only) Neelam Pav Bhaji ,Irwin square For Paanipuri - Paanipuri at suraj restaurant , Irwin square Paanipuri at stall infront of NCC bhavan Court Road( near shiv temple ) Paanipuri stall at Farshi stop Amravati Nandubhau Gupchup waale (evening 5 onwards) near HP Petrol Pump,science score Ground,behind Life fitness Gym. samrat Paanipuri (evening 5 onwards) stall at Radha Nagar Lane, near sant gadgebaba nagar For Bhel and Chat - sawaliya bhel near Travels Office,Rajapeth Yadav Bhel Near Maharashtra Education Board ,Tope Nagar (evening 5 onwards) sawaliya bhel at Prashant Nagar Garden (evening 5 onwards) Indori Poha at rajapeth(morning) Tarri Poha Chai stall at venus plaza ,shegaon Naka square ( morning only) Dabeli at Jai Bhole Dabeli vasant talkies,near Balaji temple,Raka Mall,Jaistambh square (noon till evening ) Laali Chinese stall at Prashant Nagar Garden (evening 6 onwards) chinese stall after Bank of india,near samarth school (evening 6 onwards) ice cream and Faluda at shiv shakti ,Rajkamal square Anand soda Factory in front of city kotwali Doodhpoorna Pineapple shake at rajkamal square sabudana Usal stall near Vandu hotel rajapeth (noon till evening ) Wadapaav stall at Priya talkies Jaistambh square (evening 8 onwards) Please ADD any place in comments if missed

The best and cheapest snack centres are as follows: 1- Hotel Roshni at Panchawati Square is worth it for the buttermilk he provides with Samosa Sambarwadi, etc. 2- Bharat Dahiwada House at Jaistambh Square is worth a try… WiWill never disappoint you… 3- Jai Bhole Pizza Burger centre and Sandwich centre besides it is also one of the great and cheapest and you will keep visiting again and again… 4- The Dugdhapurna at Rajkamal Square is famous for Pineapple shakes… A must try… 5- Burhanpur Juice centre and Burhanpur Jalebi Centre at Irvin square is great to taste and make you feel satiated… 6- Yadav Bhel Centre is yet another place where you will never get disappointed except when you eat Panipuri make sure you count… the boy who serves panipuri there isnt a loyal one and will charge you more for lesser number of panipuri… 7- There is a Dahipuri centre at Nawathe corner which offers you Dahipuri at a meager cost of Rs 10 with a loads of shev… Try that it is also great place to eat… 8- If you want Chinese then there is a stall at Sai Nagar named 7Star… it will provide you best of the Chinese at pocket friendly cost with the taste as well… 9- Raghuveer is a name every Amravati kar knows… If you are more health conscious then you should try Raghuveer although it is on a higher side… 10- Indori Pohe stall at Panchawati are decent ones although I won't recommend it but one can try it… 11- There is a man who comes at Power house early at 3–4am and if you are a fan of hot and spicy ‘tarri’ then this is a place to be… Should definitely Try his tarri samosa… Won't be disappointed… 12- There is a stall for South Indian cuisines like sambar wada, idli, upma only at SHEGAON Naka named Taste of South… It Opens early morning and packs up till 9am… It is also a great place for good food… 13- The milk shake at Shivshakti is also unforgettable… Near GENERAL POST OFFICE you will find a stall of Shivshakti… Worth a try…
